original_text:
And all were astonished at the majesty of God.
But while they were all marveling at everything he was doing, Jesus said to his disciples,

sentences.original_text: And all were astonished at the majesty of God.
But while they were all marveling at everything he was doing,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들이 그가 하시는 모든 일에 경이로워하는 동안,
